smpp_adapter.description: Provides connectivity between SDP and SMSC using SMPP protocol.

requirements.REQ-SMPP-1: Supports SMPP v3.3, v3.4, and v5.0
requirements.REQ-SMPP-2: Supports both transceiver and transmitter/receiver modes
requirements.REQ-SMPP-3: Handles MO/MT SMS submission and delivery receipts
requirements.REQ-SMPP-4: Supports concatenated SMS handling and charging
requirements.REQ-SMPP-5: Implements message throttling based on SLA TPS limits
requirements.REQ-SMPP-6: Provides error codes for SMPP failures and retries
requirements.REQ-SMPP-7: Generates CDRs for all SMS transactions
requirements.REQ-SMPP-8: Supports failover to backup SMSC if primary unavailable
